data.title: Texture2D drawAtPoint drawInRect Implement by direct gl call, can't works with render queue.
[WIN32] Should not force include algorithm and compile as cpp.
data.body:
in file https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/templates/lua-template-default/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.win32/HelloLua.vcxproj .

Should not force include `algorithm` and compile as cpp.

```
  <ForcedIncludeFiles>algorithm</ForcedIncludeFiles>
  <CompileAs>CompileAsCpp</CompileAs>
```

This is not friendly for c source code.

data.title: segfault isFileExist on Mac
data.body:
Hi!

A simple call `FileUtils::getInstance()->isFileExist("cool/path.txt")` leads to a segfault on Mac OS X

I gonna investigate it by myself soon.
